definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Now the latest intelligence evaluations were being announced worldwide, nearly in real time.
sentences.chinese: 现在最新的情报分析实时地向全世界公布。

sentences.english: The result will be published in time once all data are processed.
sentences.chinese: 一俟数据处理完毕，这次普查的结果将及时公布。

sentences.english: The results are published in the journal Cardiovascular Ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果公布在心血管超声波期刊上。

sentences.english: Internal appointments are advertised on the notice-board.
sentences.chinese: 内部职位在通告栏中公布。

sentences.english: Both bags had names written inside them, although these were not released.
sentences.chinese: 两个包袋内都写有名字，虽然这些名字未予公布。

sentences.english: The department's overall evaluation will be posted next week.
sentences.chinese: 这个部门的整体评量下星期将会公布。

sentences.english: Committee reports for major legislation are published separately by the Government Printing Office. ent.
sentences.chinese: 关于主要法律的委员会报告单独公布在政府印刷所。

sentences.english: In 1890, the U.S. Census Bureau declared that there was no longer such a thing as the American frontier.
sentences.chinese: 在1890年，美国统计局公布并无美国边境这一说。

sentences.english: The UnitedStates and Great Britain condemned the disclosure.
sentences.chinese: 美国与英国谴责了本次公布行为。

sentences.english: The names of the members of the team will be posted up today.
sentences.chinese: 队员名单将于今天张榜公布。

sentences.english: The information to be published may be a result of some post-processing based on the selection.
sentences.chinese: 公布的信息可能是根据选择进行某些后期处理的结果。

sentences.english: Terms of the sale were not disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 此次收购的具体条款尚未公布。

sentences.english: The 14th annual Webby Awards are to be announced in April 2010.
sentences.chinese: 第十四届年度威比奖将在2010年4月公布。

sentences.english: The post also included contact information with the assistant to the publisher.
sentences.chinese: 文章中还公布了报刊发行助理的联系方式。

sentences.english: The duration of the spaceplane's first mission isn't being announced.
sentences.chinese: 该航天飞机的第一个任务持续时间不被公布。

sentences.english: Microsoft announced a Windows Cloud OS.
sentences.chinese: 微软公布了其云计算操作系统。

definition: to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
government/official (approved or issued by an authority)
to take out of the furnace/fresh out of the oven/fig. newly announced/recently made available
to reveal/to publish/to make public/to announce
to expose (photography)/(fig.) to expose (a scandal)/(advertising) exposure/Taiwan pr. [pu4 guang1]
official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])
to announce publicly/to publish/to make known/to disclose
the other day/a few days ago
